name: CortexGear: AngryDroids
description: CortexGear:AngryDroids is a clasic 3d Sci-Fi shooting sidescroller where quick tactics and skills need to be in harmony the beat the game. A run-and-gun shooter with both mouse and keyboard controls at the same time. An adventure game with a emotional story and epic game-play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win Xp 32-bit Processor: any 1 ghz Memory: 500 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: Change your laptop keyboard configurations to 3 buttons press.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: any  Core 2 Duo 3.5 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon X1900 GT DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews.review_text: This is a game with a message, and the message is BEWARE!. This is not a game for playing -- this is a game for uninstalling and avoiding. This game is only for those keen on regurgitation. I think – no, I’m positive - that this is the most unattractive game I have ever played in my entire life. You know, in the short time I played this, this game demonstrated every loathsome characteristic of bad game design and even discovered a few new ones. It is visually repulsive, and intellectually ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥. Charging money for this is morally reprehensible, vulgar, insensitive, selfish, and stupid. The game has no purpose, a lousy sense of functionality and is broken in every sense of the word. I played Busby 3D, one of the worst platformers ever made, CortexGear:AngryDroids makes Busby 3D better, more enjoyable by just existing and lowering the bar.
really have no idea what to do what so ever if anything this should be free

This game is one of those, that just leave you speechless after playing.  ... ... ... Well, 'playing'.   First, the game doesn't offer any sort of fullscreen mode, it starts in windowed mode and doesnt let you switch (ALT+Enter still works though).   The main menu is a mess, it's some sort of first person view with the cursor deciding where you look at. The options are held quite simple and are not worth mentioning.  The game itself was nowhere to be found. I just couldn't figure out how to play, where to play, what to play. There is nothing hinting you into a direction, and the different playable 'modes' are just you in a set up area that you can't leave.   A *good game* is something entirely different.

Pure ♥♥♥♥♥. Nothing makes any sense. Spelling and grammatical errors everywhere. Voice acting is laughable. Visuals are horrible and yet still manage to produce some god awful frame rate issues.   Avoid like the plague.
